ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 285
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve been doing the dwarves lately and without sow or jboots i wouldn t dare solo them, even at 37.  they hit for 90+ and have a fair amount of hit points.  i
ygData.messageBody:
i've been doing the dwarves lately and without sow or jboots i wouldn't dare
solo them, even at 37. they hit for 90+ and have a fair amount of hit
points. i did do the ones at the stones and the pair in front of kaladim
with a level 42 enchanter. its a lot easier when she has one charmed and
after the pet wins its almost dead or very hurt itself. that's my only
experience with the dwarves so far.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L38 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

> Subject: Dwarves at Dock in Butcher Block
> >
> > I am currently level 34, and I am almost level 35.
> > Without getting into the debate about whether
> > Wizards should or should not solo, does anyone know
> > if I can solo the dwarves at the BB dock at level
> > 35? I have killed them in a group and I have seen
> > level 35 pet classes soloing them, but I am not sure
> > if a wizzie can solo them at 35. Anyone soloed them
> > at 35? If not, has anyone soloed them? If so, what
> > level?
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> > Gantorek Ttefabob of Clan Cathar on the Povar Server
> >
